document_data.title: The Ruins of Undermountain II: The Deep Levels
document_data.author:
[[Jean Rabe]] and [[Norm Ritchie]] (Campaign Guide)
[[Donald J. Bingle]] (Campaign Guide/Adventures)

[[Karen S. Boomgarden]]

[[Laura Craig]]
[[Linda Bingle]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''The Ruins of Undermountain II: The Deep Levels''''' is a 2{{nd}}-edition ''Advanced Dungeons & Dragons'' boxed set for the ''[[Forgotten Realms]]''.

{{quote|''"Looking for adventure are ye?''
''Looking for a place brimming with silver and gold,''
''a place dripping with things magical?"''

''"I know a place far and not far from here where all of that—and more—can be had. But mind me lads and lassies, there are other things there as well—danger and risk and uncertainty, and creatures never before seen by the likes of sell-swords and wizards who tread upon the sun-lit lands of the [[Forgotten Realms|Realms]]."''

''"This place is called Undermountain. And it is far beneath the crust of this world, yet right under fair [[Waterdeep]]. It is a dangerous labyrinth nestled deep in the bowels of the earth. It is a dungeon. I, [[Elminster]] of [[Shadowdale]], know well. I shall tell you of these twisting corridors, and of the [[Halaster Blackcloak|man]] who made them his. Listen ye carefully—especially if ye are intent on delving into its depths. Perhaps what I tell you could save your life."''

''"Perhaps."''

''This sequel to ''THE RUINS OF UNDERMOUNTAIN'' contains the 128-page ''Campaign Guide to Undermountain: The Deep Levels'', a 32-page adventure booklet, a 16-page MONSTROUS COMPENDIUM booklet, four full-color, poster-size maps of the levels described in this boxed set, and a set of eight DM Assistance Cards to aid in trapping the corridors and rooms of this, the greatest and most dangerous dungeon in all the Realms.''

''The original campaign expansion set wasn't enough? Well, then, pack your gear and delve into ''The Ruins of Undermountain II: The Deep Levels''. The deep-dwellers await!''}}
document_data.Description:
''The Ruins of Undermountain II: The Deep Levels'' is the sequel to ''[[The Ruins of Undermountain]]''. It is the second supplement about the infamous ''über''-dungeon, [[Undermountain]], and is followed by three adventure modules and another sourcebook.

The boxed set includes several booklets that provide detailed descriptions of the deep levels of Undermountain. They cover various new areas, including never-before-seen dungeons, traps, and enemy encounters. Detailed maps are included, which expand upon the geographical scope presented in the first set. These maps help Dungeon Masters navigate and plan sessions that explore these lower and more perilous levels.

The boxed set provides numerous new adventure hooks and quests. These are designed to integrate smoothly with the lore and challenges established in the earlier parts of Undermountain. An assortment of new monsters and villains specific to the deep levels are introduced, complete with stat blocks and lore, enabling DMs to enhance combat and storytelling.

Contents.Adventure: Troglodyte Warren:
{{Main|The Ruins of Undermountain II: The Deep Levels/Troglodyte Warren}}
* In this short adventure module, one of Undermountain's periodic ''[[portal]]s'' leads a camping adventuring party to face a raid from the [[Urggroth-Kyan]] clan and a chase after them into the titular [[Troglodyte Warrens]].
** Introduction
** Troglodyte Raid
** Keyed Encounters
Contents.Adventure: Survival of the Fittest:
{{Main|The Ruins of Undermountain II: The Deep Levels/Survival of the Fittest}}
* In this short adventure module, braggart players are taken to task by the [[ghost]] of [[Fidelio]] with a trip through the [[Obstacle Course]] level.
** Introduction
** Regrets Only
** Keyed Encounters
Contents.Adventure: The Well of Shadows:
{{Main|The Ruins of Undermountain II: The Deep Levels/The Well of Shadows}}
* In this short adventure module, an attack by [[shadow]]s drives players to uncover the fate of a lost adventuring party.
** Introduction
** Hiding in Shadows
** Keyed Encounters
